title: The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Tactics
body:
The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Tactics


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Tactics, Isometric, 3D, Turn-based
Companies: BonusXP, En Masse Entertainment
Languages: ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 2.7 GB
Repack Size: 971 MB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]

  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on The.Dark.Crystal.Age.of.Resistance.Tactics-CODEX ISO release: codex-the.dark.crystal.age.of.resistance.tactics.iso (2,857,861,120 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.7 GB to 971 MB)
  • Installation takes 1-2 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5 GB
  • Add the following paremeter to game desktop icon settings to force the language of your choice: –ForceLanguage=”zz”, where zz should be replaced with: en, cn, da, de, es, fr, it, ja, ko, pl, sv, tr
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

In The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Tactics, you will lead a fledgling resistance of Gelfling against their oppressive overlords, the Skeksis, across more than 50 unique turn-based tactics RPG battles. Along the way, you will recruit and customize new allies by assigning them jobs, modifying their abilities, and outfitting them with equipment to ensure victory. With 14 playable characters, including familiar faces from the classic film and the new Netflix original series, build your own teams and devise winning strategies to overthrow the rule of the Skeksis and restore light to the Gelfling homeworld of Thra!
